Bash(git -C "H:\\Github\\EyesOfAzrael" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: 12-agent comprehensive code polish sprint

## SPA Navigation \(Agent 1\)
- Add conditional logging system \(SPA_DEBUG flag\)
- Replace 100+ console.log with spaLog/spaWarn/spaError
- Fix waitForAuth\(\) to return explicit timeout state
- Add retry logic for failed route transitions

## Landing Page \(Agent 2\)
- Add emoji fallbacks for missing SVG icons
- Add onerror handlers for graceful icon degradation
- Clean up CSS !important abuse
- Remove dead code paths

## Entity Card \(Agent 3\)
- Add validateEntityId\(\) and validateEntityType\(\) 
- Track event listeners in _eventListeners array
- Add destroy\(\) method for cleanup
- Prevent memory leaks with _isDestroyed flag

## Favorites Service \(Agent 4\)
- Add O\(1\) lookups with _favoritedLookup Map/Set
- Add _pendingLocalChanges for offline conflict resolution
- Add online/offline sync handling
- Implement proper auth checks before operations

## Theme System \(Agent 5\)
- Add DEFAULT_THEME_CONFIG fallback
- Add multi-tier storage \(localStorage â†’ sessionStorage â†’ memory\)
- Add applyEarlyTheme\(\) for FOUC prevention
- Add connectThemeToggleButton\(\) integration

## Entity Detail Viewer \(Agent 6\)
- Add relatedEntityCache with 5-minute TTL
- Implement batch loading \(MAX_IDS_PER_QUERY = 10\)
- Add async loadRelatedEntitiesAsync\(\) with loading states
- Fix N+1 query problem

## App Init \(Agent 7\)
- Add undefined function checks before calls
- Add timeout handling for initialization steps
- Add dependency verification

## Auth Guard \(Agent 8\)
- Add Firebase initialization checks
- Add privacy improvements
- Add logout confirmation handling

## CSS Ambiance \(Agent 9\)
- Add CSS variable fallbacks \(--color-text-secondary, etc.\)
- Add will-change declarations for animations
- Add rgba fallbacks for color variables

## Entity Renderer \(Agent 10\)
- Add COLLECTION_NAME_MAP for type â†’ collection
- Add VALID_ENTITY_TYPES Set for validation
- Add input validation and error handling

## Display Renderer \(Agent 11\)
- Add input validation
- Add XSS prevention through HTML escaping
- Add empty state handling

## Index HTML \(Agent 12\)
- Fix script ordering
- Add font preloading
- Add noscript fallback

## Service Worker
- Bump to v2.5.0 to force cache refresh
